title: incident
description: An incident is a grouping of adversary behavior that describes a set of malicious activities or attacks that occur over a period of time against a specific set of targets.

aliases.description: Alternative names used to identify this incident.

first_seen.description: The time that this Incident was first seen.

last_seen.description: The time that this Incident was last seen.

objective.description: This field defines the Incidentâ€™s primary goal, objective, desired outcome, or intended effect.
